directions: Arrange slices of carrot on a plate or serving tray. In a small bowl, mix together the tuna, green onions and mayonnaise. Spoon some onto each slice of carrot and serve immediately.
ingredients: 1 large carrot, sliced diagonally into 1/4 inch thick slices
1 (5 ounce) can tuna packed in water, drained
title: Carrot and Tuna Bites
